Package com.payd.shooti.ui.drawables

Class TextureAnimationDrawable

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.BaseDrawable
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.TextureRegionDrawable
com.payd.shooti.ui.drawables.TextureAnimationDrawable
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Drawable, com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.TransformDrawable, IUpdate
public class TextureAnimationDrawable extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.TextureRegionDrawable implements IUpdate
This class represents a drawable object that can animate a sequence of textures. The Drawable is wrapped around a Animation in nature. update(float) will iterate through the animation keyframes and apply the result to the internal TextureRegionDrawable superclass.

      public void setStateTime(float stateTime)

    • setComplete

      public void setComplete(boolean complete)
      Sets the complete value of the TextureAnimationDrawable. This should not be called outside of particular circumstances.

    • isLooping

      public boolean isLooping()
      Checks if the animation is looping.
      Returns:
      if getPlayMode() == Animation.PlayMode.LOOP

    • isComplete

      public boolean isComplete()
      Checks if the animation is complete.
      Returns:
      true if the animation is complete. If the animation playmode is set to loop, false is returned.
